## packFloat3() function

Compresses three floats to R11F\_G11F\_B10F format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function packFloat3(a: number, b: number, c: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | first of the three floats |
|  b | number | second of the three floats |
|  c | number | third of the tree floats |

**Returns:**

number

The compressed result

## Remarks

The implementation is adopt from https://github.com/microsoft/DirectXMath
